g. Family Planning
 ∙ Pregnancy is the best period for family planning counselling as it gives the couple time to think about and 
choose the method they would want to use after the birth of their baby. Ask about the couple’s plans for having 
more children. If they desire more children, then advise them that a gap of 3-4 years between pregnancies is 
healthy for the mother and the child.
